document.full_text: a former hedge fund manager has been charged with defrauding investors of at least $12.6 million in a federal indictment on friday, nearly two years after the fund collapsed under the weight of failed real estate loans.
document.title: manager of defunct u.s. hedge fund accused of fraud
lines_and_colors: a former hedge fund manager has been charged with defrauding investors of at least $12.6 million in a federal indictment on friday, nearly two years after the fund collapsed under the weight of failed real estate loans.
